options.name: Destination URL origin
options.description: The destination URL not including the path. For example: https://www.example.com

options.name: Include path
options.description: If enabled, the path of the original URL will be appended to the destination URL. For example: http://127.0.0.1:80/path/to/page will redirect to https://www.example.com/path/to/page. If disabled, the destination URL will not include the path, such as https://www.example.com.
